reuters.title: SCHLUMBERGER LTD 3RD QTR NET PROFIT 1,697,000 VS LOSS 41.9 MLN DLRS
reuters.body: Shr 51 cts Net 51 mln dlrs vs 65 mln dlrs Revs 1.3 billion vs 1.1 billion Nine mths Shr 2.07 dlrs Net 189 mln vs 215 mln Revs 3.9 billion vs 3.3 billion NOTE: Full name is Shearson Lehman Brothers Holdings Inc Company went public May 7, 1987 Reuter 
